required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study to Assess the Effect of Rifampin on the Metabolism of ABT-199
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase 1 Study to Assess the Effect of Rifampin on the Pharmacokinetics of ABT-199

brief_summary.textblock: This is an open-label multicenter, study to assess the pharmacokinetic interaction of rifampin with ABT-199 in up to 12 subjects with relapsed or refractory non-Hodgkin's lymphoma.

detailed_description.textblock: This is a Phase 1 study designed to assess how the body processes the study drug ABT-199 when taken alone and in combination with rifampin and to assess the safety of ABT-199 in combination with rifampin. Subjects may enroll in a separate extension study to continue receiving ABT-199 after completion of this study.

clinical_study.why_stopped: This study will be conducted in healthy volunteer subjects.

primary_outcome.measure: Determination of maximum observed plasma concentration (Cmax), time to Cmax (peak time, Tmax), terminal phase elimination rate constant (beta), terminal phase elimination half-life (t1/2), & area under the plasma concentration-time curve (AUC) of ABT-199
primary_outcome.time_frame: Measured pre-dose and up to 96 hours post-dose ABT-199
primary_outcome.description: Blood samples for pharmacokinetic (PK) analysis of ABT-199 will be collected at designated timepoints to assess the PK parameters for ABT-199 alone relative to ABT-199 with rifampin

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of subjects with adverse events
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Measured up to 30 days after the last dose of study drug
secondary_outcome.description: Subjects will be monitored for clinical and laboratory evidence of adverse events throughout the study

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of subjects with adverse events
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Measured up to 30 days after the last dose of study drug
secondary_outcome.description: Subjects will be monitored for clinical and laboratory evidence of adverse events throughout the study

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in physical exam finding, including vital signs
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Measured from Day 1 up to 30 days after the last dose of study drug
secondary_outcome.description: Body temperature, weight, blood pressure, heart rate

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in clinical laboratory test results
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Measured from Day 1 up to 30 days after the last dose of study drug
Measured from Day 1 up to Day 19

intervention.description: Subjects will be dosed with ABT-199, then dosed with ABT-199 in combination with rifampin
Subjects will be dosed with ABT-199, then dosed with ABT-199 in combination with rifampin
